alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Nolan; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 9:41PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Callahan, southeastern Jones, east central Nolan and Taylor Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 940 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nolan, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Wylie, Nolan, Tye, Tuscola, Buffalo Gap, Eula, Dudley, Potosi, View, Hamby, Coronados Camp, Caps, Dyess Afb, Impact, Lake Abilene, Camp Tonkawa, Camp Butman and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 273 and 300. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
